Class¶

XPSPL¶

The XPSPL object works as the global instance used for managing the global processor instance.

Methods¶

init¶

init()

Initialise the global processor instance.

Parameters:boolean – Store a history of all events.
Return type:object XPSPLProcessor

version¶

version()

Returns the current version of XPSPL.

Return type:string

Constants¶

XPSPL_VERSION¶

XPSPL_MASTERMIND¶

XPSPL_PATH¶
